00038 MetadataRoot::MetadataRoot(SchemaPtr &schema_ptr) : m_next(0) {
00039   int error;
00040   HandleCallbackPtr null_callback;
00041   typedef std::list<Schema::AccessGroup *> AgList;
00042   AgList *ag_list = schema_ptr->get_access_group_list();
00043   for (AgList::iterator ag_iter = ag_list->begin(); ag_iter != ag_list->end(); ag_iter++)
00044     m_agnames.push_back((*ag_iter)->name);
00045 
00046   if ((error = Global::hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root", OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_callback, &m_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00047     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating Hyperspace root file '/hypertable/root' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00048     HT_ABORT;
00049   }
00050 
00051 }
00052

00058 MetadataRoot::~MetadataRoot() {
00059   int error;
00060   if ((error = Global::hyperspace_ptr->close(m_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00061     HT_WARNF("Problem closing Hyperspace handle - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00062   }
00063 }

00067 void MetadataRoot::reset_files_scan() {
00068   m_next = 0;
00069 }

00073 bool MetadataRoot::get_next_files(std::string &ag_name, std::string &files) {
00074   int error;
00075 
00076   while (m_next < m_agnames.size()) {
00077     DynamicBuffer value(0);
00078     std::string attrname = (std::string)"files." + m_agnames[m_next];
00079     m_next++;
00080     Global::hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(true);
00081     if ((error = Global::hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_handle, attrname.c_str(), value)) != Error::OK) {
00082       if (error == Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND)
00083         continue;
00084       HT_ERRORF("Problem getting attribute '%s' on Hyperspace file '/hypertable/root' - %s",
00085                    attrname.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00086       Global::hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(false);
00087       return false;
00088     }
00089     files = (const char *)value.base;
00090     Global::hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(false);
00091     return true;
00092   }
00093 
00094   Global::hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(false);
00095   return false;
00096 }

00100 void MetadataRoot::write_files(std::string &ag_name, std::string &files) {
00101   int error;
00102   std::string attrname = (std::string)"files." + ag_name;
00103 
00104   if ((error = Global::hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_handle, attrname.c_str(), files.c_str(), files.length())) != Error::OK)
00105     throw Hypertable::Exception(error, (std::string)"Problem creating attribute '" + attrname + "' on Hyperspace file '/hypertable/root'");
00106 
00107 }
